Basic Attack

At-Will âœ¦ Necrotic

Standard

Reach 3

+29 vs AC; 2d10+9 damage, and the target is weakened (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 3

+29 vs AC; 1d10+9 damage.

At-Will

Standard

The dragon makes a bite attack and a claw attack.

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When an enemy misses the dragon with a melee attack, at-will

The dragon uses its tail to attack the target; targets the triggering enemy; +29 vs AC; 2d8+9 damage.

Recharge 5-6 âœ¦ Necrotic

Standard

Close blast 5

+27 vs Fortitude; 2d12+5 necrotic damage, and the target loses one healing surge and is weakened (save ends). Aftereffect: The target's necrotic resistance is negated until the end of the encounter. Miss: Half damage, and the target does not lose a healing surge.

Encounter âœ¦ Necrotic

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

The dragon's breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it immediately.

Encounter âœ¦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +25 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

At-Will âœ¦ Zone

Minor 1/Round

Area burst 2 within 20

Sustain Minor

This power creates a zone of darkness that remains in place until the end of the dragon's next turn. The zone blocks line of sight for all creatures except the dragon. Any creature entirely within the area (except the dragon) is blinded.
The shadow dragon deals 4d6 extra damage against a target it has combat advantage against.

At-Will âœ¦ Teleportation

Move

A shadow dragon that is in at least one square of a globe of darkness can teleport to any other globe of darkness within line of sight. It must end this move in at least one square of that globe of darkness.

Resist 30 necrotic Vulnerable radiant (whenever a shadow dragon takes radiant damage, one of its globes of darkness ends) 		Init +25 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 41Fort 37Ref 41Will 37
Speed 10, fly 10 (hover), overland flight 20, swim 10

Con 20 (+17)		Dex 29 (+21)
Int 18 (+16)		Wis 21 (+17)
Cha 17 (+15)
Languages Draconic
Alignment Evil
Skills Intimidate +20, Stealth +26Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 27 | Insight 27
